mapper.select: SELECT id, commodity_id, service_id, service_name, qty, wt, operatior_time, operatior_name, operatior_remark, inner_org_id FROM in_order_operatior where id = #{id}
SELECT id, commodity_id, service_id, service_name, qty, wt, operatior_time, operatior_name, operatior_remark, inner_org_id FROM in_order_operatior where 1 = 1 order by id desc
